entry.div:
For making
bronze
in the color of gold
Take six
ounces
of
calcined tin
& as much of
natural sulfur
& six
ounces
of
sal ammoniac
, and put the
tin
to melt in a
spoon
. When it is melted, put in
quicksilver
, and cast it in a line, then
pestle
all these
drugs
together in a
mortar
,
&

div.ab:
and put it into an
earthen
pot
, & it should have many hot
ashes
underneath, & little by little you will make the fire underneath bigger and bigger, & one ought not to move it, & when it is cooked, & it needs to be for six
hours
,
mind that the fumes do not harm you for they are bad
.
